public class Transform
extends Object

Transform(double, double, double, double, int, int, int, int)
Creates a transform that will scale numbers from a double precision arena to an integer space.
Transform(double, double, double, double, Point, Point)
Creates a transform that will scale numbers from a double precision arena to an integer space.

point(double, double)
Returns a transformed integerized Point from double precision X and Y coordinates
pointList(double[], double[])
Transforms an array of double precision X and Y values into an array of integerized Point classes
toString()
xValue(int)
Transforms an integer X value into a double precision X value.
yValue(int)
Transforms an integer Y value into a double precision Y value.

Transform 
  public Transform(double dllX,
                   double dllY,
                   double durX,
                   double durY,
                   int illX,
                   int illY,
                   int iurX,
                   int iurY)
Creates a transform that will scale numbers from a double precision arena to an integer space.
Parameters:
dllX - lower left X
dllY - lower left Y
durX - upper right X
durY - upper right Y
illX - lower left X
illY - lower left Y
iurX - upper right X
iurY - upper right Y
Transform 
  public Transform(double dllX,
                   double dllY,
                   double durX,
                   double durY,
                   Point ll,
                   Point ur)
Creates a transform that will scale numbers from a double precision arena to an integer space.
Parameters:
dllX - lower left X
dllY - lower left Y
durX - upper right X
durY - upper right Y
ll - integer lower left
ur - integer upper right

point

                     double y)
Returns a transformed integerized Point from double precision X and Y coordinates
pointList

                           double y[])
Transforms an array of double precision X and Y values into an array of integerized Point classes
xValue 
  public double xValue(int ix)
Transforms an integer X value into a double precision X value. This method is used to translate the X component of a pixel coordinate into data or percentage space
yValue 
  public double yValue(int iy)
Transforms an integer Y value into a double precision Y value. This method is used to translate the Y component of a pixel coordinate into data or percentage space
